replies.body:
Someone who translates into languages other than English.
For example, if you go to the rules page, you can see that multiple languages are available.

The Translators did that :)
replies.body_tagged:

The Translators did that :)

replies.body: Uh we translate Avicus related content from English to the language we got picked to translate as. In my case, I'd translate Avicus related content from English to Spanish.
replies.body_tagged: Uh we translate Avicus related content from English to the language we got picked to translate as. In my case, I'd translate Avicus related content from English to Spanish.

replies.body:
If you saw it in ts as a staff rank, its a person who translates texts like rules or help while screensharing if they are having a hard time communicating.
If your talking in general its just something that translates text.
replies.body_tagged:

replies.body:
It's quite self-explanatory... they convert text from one language to another.

Here's the announcement post.
^ You can find the information there, but the team is out of date.
